hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Dharr that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“I know a word – (one of the narrators) ‘Uthman said: “a Verse” – which if all the people followed it, it would suffice them.” They said: “O Messenger of Allah, which Verse?” He said: “And whosoever fears Allah, He will make a way out for him.” [65:]
